<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
THATCH: Aunt Melorae, we have found <color=orange>an island entirely unvisited by cyclones!</color> Plume says the site looks hospitable enough to even construct <color=orange>a new settlement</color> to house us! Could you assist me in bringing our supplies to this new island?
Pioneer_I EX1 1
